definition: Kim Jong-un (c. 1983-), third son of Kim Jong-il 金正日[Jin1 Zheng4 ri4], supreme leader of North Korea from 2011
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
favor/grace/kindness
variant of 恩[en1]

sentences.english: This year the focus of attention was on just one man, Kim Jong-un.
sentences.chinese: 今年，焦点集中在一个人的身上，那就是金正恩。

sentences.english: Kim Jong Il has anointed his twenty-six-year-old son Kim Jong-un as his successor.
sentences.chinese: 金正日指定二十六岁的儿子金正恩为继承人。

sentences.english: They were to be a present from China to Kim Jung-Un.
sentences.chinese: 它们应当是中国给金正恩的礼物的。

sentences.english: Now we also have the honour of serving young general Kim Jong-un.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们为年轻的将军金正恩服务而感到无尚荣光。

sentences.english: Jang provides a support network for Kim Jong Un, who is his nephew.
sentences.chinese: 张成泽为他的侄子金正恩提供了一个支持者人脉。

sentences.english: Kim Jong Un will have many obstacles to overcome.
sentences.chinese: 摆在金正恩前面的，是层峦叠嶂的困难需要他去克服。

sentences.english: North Korea's new leader Kim Jong-un has been given two posts previous occupied by his late father.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜新领导金正恩被授予两个他先父曾拥有的新职位。

sentences.english: But if Jin Zhengen really visit, 2 months late is a good time.
sentences.chinese: 但假如金正恩真的访华，2月中下旬是个合适的时间。

definition: abbr. for 朝鮮中央通訊社|朝鲜中央通讯社[Chao2 xian3 Zhong1 yang1 Tong1 xun4 she4]
Rodong Sinmun (Workers' news), the official newspaper of the North Korean WPK's Central Committee
Baekdu or Changbai mountains 長白山|长白山, volcanic mountain range between Jilin province and North Korea, prominent in Manchu and Korean mythology
Kim Il Sung (1912-1994) Great Leader of North Korea
Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the ruling party of North Korea
North Korean Central News Agency (KCNA)/abbr. to 朝中社[Chao2 zhong1 she4]
pinyin: Chao2 xian3 Zhong1 yang1 Tong1 xun4 she4
